    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_111658</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_111658</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Joining of genome fragments and pBR322</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbinden der Genomfragmente und des pBR322</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Se joindre des fragments de génome et de pBR322</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Juntar de fragmentos do genome e de pBR322</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unendosi dei frammenti del genome e di pBR322</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένωση των τεμαχίων γονιδιώματος και pBR322</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ensamblar de los fragmentos del genoma y 
de pBR322</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the joining of the sticky ends of fragments of plasmid pBR322 and genome to form circular fragments of genome, recombinant plasmids and unaltered plasmid.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circular fragment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">genome fragment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pBR322</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plasmid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">recombinant plasmid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sticky ends</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">unaltered plasmid</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Verbinden der klebrigen 
Enden der Fragmente des Plasmids pBR322 und des Genoms zu den 
kreisförmigen Fragmenten des Formulars des Genoms, der recombinant 
Plasmide und des unveränderten Plasmids.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre se joindre des 
extrémités collantes des fragments du plasmide pBR322 et du génome 
aux fragments circulaires de forme du génome, des plasmides de 
recombinaison et du plasmide inchangé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra juntar das extremidades 
pegajosas dos fragmentos do plasmid pBR322 e do genome aos fragmentos 
circulares do formulário do genome, de plasmids recombinant e de 
plasmid unaltered.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra unirsi delle 
estremità appiccicose dei frammenti del plasmide pBR322 e del genome 
ai frammenti circolari della forma del genome, dei plasmidi 
recombinant e del plasmide invariato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την ένωση των κολλωδών 
ακρών των τεμαχίων του πλασμιδίου pBR322 και του γονιδιώματος 
στα κυκλικά τεμάχια μορφής του γονιδιώματος, των ανασυνδυαζόμενων
πλασμιδίων και του αμετάβλητου πλασμιδίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra ensamblar de los 
extremos pegajosos de fragmentos del plasmid pBR322 y del genoma a
los fragmentos circulares de la forma del genoma, de plasmids 
recombinant y del plasmid inalterado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kreisförmiges Fragment</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Genomfragment</string>
          </keyword>
